author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> HI everyone, for those interested the Ethereum - OASIS (new name) L2 Standards WG will meet tomorrow (May 1) at 7 am PST/10 am EST/14:00 UTC /15:00 CET/11 pm JSTÂ 

Agenda
 1. Welcome, and a reminder of the WG meeting rule
2.  Selection of scribe
3. Introduction of new participants
4. Finalize draft of article and WG feedback (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oLEZVaTSDMVTjMbB2rbbLXRZOQP81_hY_82UpjDGBdY/edit?usp=drivesdk)
5. Continue review of full L2 Transaction Fee API spec PR (PR#53 -- https://github.com/eea-oasis/L2/pull/53)
6. Review Open Issues
7. Open Forum for other items

This is the zoom link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81599021689?pwd=VmxPVUNCVmE5RkkweGY1YmN1OWMrZz09

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Should we have some more L2 channels in R&D Discord?
I feel like as more and more L2s become relevant to Ethereum design decisions it would probably make sense to try to attract some L2 peeps also over to this discord.
Wouldn't create like OP channel or Base channel, but rather L2 general channels. Rollcall channel could be the first in a new group.

author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> For those interested, the L2 Standards WG starts in 33 min discussing the L2 Transaction Fee API spec and a new article about account abstraction, key management across chains and self-sovereign identity. 

Meeting zoom link is here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81599021689?pwd=VmxPVUNCVmE5RkkweGY1YmN1OWMrZz09
